desc: Private cloud computing enables you to consolidate diverse enterprise systems into one that is cloud-based and can be accessed by end-users seamlessly, regardless of their location or changes in overall demand. Expert authors Steve Smoot and Nam K. Tan distill their years of networking experience to describe how to build enterprise networks to create a private cloud. With their techniques youâ€™ll create cost-saving designs and increase the flexibility of your enterprise, while maintaining the security and control of an internal network.
title: Private Cloud Computing: Consolidation, Virtualization, and Service-Oriented Infrastructure
